name: IT Applications Intern
description: Developed numerous custom applications and programs for various business users using C# and Python.
Implemented and maintained multiple integration ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) jobs using Tibco Data Virtualization (TDV) and Business Object Data Services (BODS).
Implemented multiple integrations using TDV’s REST APIs.
Used ServiceNow to keep track of active tickets, and perform multiple change tickets.
Collaborated with co-workers and business users to ensure on-time delivery of software solutions.

name: Research Assistant
description: Used Unity and C# to create a virtual reality (VR) rehearsal space for actors, and a building vulnerability test platform, developed for the Oculus Quest.
Managed and facilitated design critique sessions with participants to evaluate the developed prototypes.
Developed an encoding system using NodeJS to store participants' data directly from the game to a database system (MongoDB).
Managed monetary asset purchases for both projects.
Proactively participated in weekly team meetings and prepared weekly notes and videos to demonstrate progress.
